This repository provides Openproblems with helper packages in R and Python, and base Docker images for components.

## Core packages ([README](packages/README.md))

The Core packages are helper packages in R and Python that provide common functionality that are regularly used for OpenProblems components.

## Base Docker images ([README](base_images/README.md))

The base Docker images are used to run OpenProblems components. They contain the necessary dependencies to run components in Python and R.

The images are stored on dockerhub and can be found [here](https://hub.docker.com/r/openproblems).
